<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">d063522fc310121061bd1c377d01313a</macroponent><name>rich_text_2/html</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  var createdBySysId = api.item.value.sys_created_by.value;
var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    
    // Query the sys_user table where user_name matches the given createdBySysId
    userGR.addQuery('user_name', createdBySysId);
    userGR.query();
    
    // Check if the record is found
    if (userGR.next()) {
        // Return the first_name as a string
        return userGR.first_name.toString();
    } else {
        // Return a default message if no user is found
        return 'User not found';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-03 19:51:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>de046663c314121061bd1c377d0131c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>rich_text_2/html</sys_name><sys_package display_value="auction" source="x_1520630_auction">e8166963c3c4121061bd1c377d013188</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="auction">e8166963c3c4121061bd1c377d013188</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_de046663c314121061bd1c377d0131c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-03 20:13:46</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
